name: tasktimeflow
description: TaskTimeFlow - かんばん方式とタイムラインを統合した革新的生産性向上SaaS

scripts.build: echo 'Building TaskTimeFlow...' && cd apps/web && npm run build
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting development server...' && cd apps/web && npm run dev
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting code...' && cd apps/web && npm run lint
scripts.type-check: echo 'Type checking...' && cd apps/web && npm run type-check

scripts.docker:clean: docker-compose down -v --rmi all --remove-orphans && docker system prune -af
